description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bmn5n","text":"Protocol for performing immunofluorescence staining using antibody signal enhancement (ASE) on vibratome cut brain sections from rats or mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Adjust pH to 9.0","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dets8","text":"      \nTris-HCl-EDTA buffer pH 9.0 (25mM Tris) + 0.05% SDS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afjum","text":"        95 mL Tris-HCl-EDTA buffer (25mM Tris)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4g30c","text":"        5 mL SDS 1%","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fv22s","text":"        Mix to dissolve. status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6b1ji","text":"Briefly rinse sections in 1/2 PBS + 1/2 AD and mount on Superfrost Plus Slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5qt2f","text":"Air dry slides overnight at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bd2n","text":"1X PBS rinse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d5smv","text":"Note: All washes performed in Tissue-Tek Staining Trays, on the wobbler. 100 mL / tray.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ea1f3","text":"Antigen retrieval step (using Steamer).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"pi6e","text":"Fill water to the maximum level in the steamer (use distilled water).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9angp","text":"Place Tissue-Tek Staining Trays containing Antigen retrieval solution (Tris-HCl-EDTA buffer pH 9.0 + 0.05% SDS ; see recipe in Materials) in the steam bowl. Fill with 100 mL / tray.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7pcfa","text":"Wait at least   for the solutions in the steam bowl to reach 95-98oC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":66,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bmpcr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dphlp","text":"Place the glass slides with the tissue in the Antigen retrieval solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ajv8u","text":"Start timer for antigen retrieval ( ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2a03p","text":"Refill with distilled water the tank as needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dtgda","text":"After antigen retrieval : Place the Tissue-Tek Staining Trays from the Steamer on ice for   (in cold room).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":90,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1bd5o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b52mj","text":"Dry slides and add hydrophobic barriers on each side of the tissue section. Do not let the barrier touch the tissue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6fq2g","text":"Wash slides with ASE Wash buffer (PBS + 0.5% Tween-20 ; see recipe in Materials) for   at room temperature on wobbler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6eiau","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ahkl5","text":"Wash slides with ASE Wash buffer for   at room temperature on wobbler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ukej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6i12p","text":"Prepare box for slide incubation. Place wet tissue paper on the bottom to create a humid chamber. Add the glass slides inside facing up.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ej8ej","text":"Pipette   ASE Blocking solution (PBS + 2% donkey serum , 50 mM glycine, 0.05% Tween-20, 0.1% Tergitol, 0.1% BSA ; see recipe in Materials) per glass slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a7ddl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"h2gd","text":"Block for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7i044","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"drbun","text":"Discard the blocking solution, and pipette instead   of primary antibody solution per glass slide. Dilute primary antibodies in ASE primary antibody buffer (PBS + 10 mM glycine, 0.05% Tween-20, 0.1% Tergitol, 0.1% H2O2 ; see recipe in Materials).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":215,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":217,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9m24m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7cocg","text":"Wash slides with ASE wash buffer (quick rinse).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6c29m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f3dja","text":"Wash slides with ASE wash buffer for   at room temperature on wobbler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2lhn5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dc0pf","text":"Wash slides with ASE wash buffer for   at room temperature on wobbler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"2EC97040CCCD11EE973C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9mdo0","text":"Place the glass slides in the incubation box. Pipette   of secondary antibody solution per glass slide. Dilute secondary antibodies in ASE secondary antibody buffer (PBS + 0.1% Tween-20 ; see recipe in Materials).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8sgrq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"670pi","text":"Incubate with secondary antibodies in the dark for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9s44o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d25rv","text":"Wash slides with PBS (quick rinse).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7gr1r","text":"Wash slides with PBS for   at room temperature on wobbler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8o13l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dqq9","text":"Wash slides with PBS for   at room temperature on wobbler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"968212D6CCCD11EE973C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8f8b5","text":"Remove hydrophobic barriers. Allow sections to dry and mount with Mowiol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"evepe","text":"Incubate with primary antibodies overnight at 4oC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":47,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
